name: Sunshine and chocolate bars
description:
Journal entry - shoot day 11

“In the delusions of being caught off guard here, we stand in this beautiful un-stillness. Beautiful moments of complete weirdness. Who’s weird right now? Charlie has revealed himself, round and beautifully round. It got loose. It's loose. Or whatnot. There's the magic. Here we stand in the whatnot. The acid is rolling in clean and free, we sit around beautifully. Happiness and lollipops. Devolving sugars of sweet delight. We too lived off sunshine and chocolate bars. What a fucking line. Heroin baby".

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making. 

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

2/10

Photographer: Gerard Wood
